product_summary: Feathery is an AI-powered form builder that helps businesses create and manage forms quickly and easily. With its intuitive drag-and-drop interface and customizable templates, users can create forms that are tailored to their specific needs. Feathery also offers a range of features to enhance the form-building process, such as conditional logic, file uploads, and integrations with other popular software. It is an ideal tool for businesses of all sizes looking to streamline their form creation and management processes.
product_pros: File upload support for collecting various data types
Integrations with popular software for seamless workflow
product_cons: Limited customization options compared to coding
May require a learning curve for advanced features
Pricing can be higher for larger teams or custom needs
Limited mobile support for form editing
Occasional technical glitches reported by users

product_usecases.details: Feathery's forms can be used to gather feedback from customers, helping businesses improve their products or services.
Forms can be designed to capture leads, such as contact information or preferences, for marketing and sales purposes.
Feathery can be used to create forms for event registration, allowing businesses to collect attendee information and manage registrations efficiently.
Forms can be used to collect customer orders, process payments, and generate invoices, streamlining the order fulfillment process.
Feathery's forms can be used to create job application forms, allowing businesses to collect candidate information, resumes, and other relevant materials.

product_toolfor.details: Feathery is a cost-effective and easy-to-use solution for small businesses looking to improve their form creation and management processes.
Feathery's forms can help marketing teams gather leads, conduct surveys, and collect customer feedback.
Feathery can be used to create support forms, knowledge base articles, and other resources to improve customer service.
Feathery's forms can be used to create online quizzes, assignments, and surveys for educational purposes.
Feathery offers non-profit discounts and can be used to create donation forms, volunteer applications, and event registration forms.

product_pricing: Feathery offers three pricing plans: Basic, Pro, and Enterprise. The Basic plan starts at $19 per month and includes unlimited forms, 100 submissions per month, and basic features. The Pro plan starts at $49 per month and includes unlimited forms, 1000 submissions per month, advanced features, and integrations. The Enterprise plan is customized for larger teams and businesses with specific requirements and pricing is available upon request.
